name: Sir Yur Computer Has Virus
description:
This Game was being developed by me and my friends. Although we planned too, unfortunately we never carried on with this game concept after making the demo.  This Demo only has two characters and 10 endings but the original idea was to have a wide array of characters to try and convince. Including characters like Scam Baiters and people who just want to waste your time. 

Credit to TheGengarKing for making the Character Pixel Art. All other art is placeholder art by me. 

Credit to Zark for Writing the Gunther Clinton character. 

Also credit to Uberduck AI for Providing the Placeholder Text to speech. 

The Menu and Ending Scene is also meant as a Placeholder 😊
